verses.verse: This was the lot <S%H1486><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> for he was the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Joseph. <S%H3130><s%> As for Machir <S%H4353><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> because he was a man <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> therefore he had Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

So this was for the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Abiezer, <S%H44><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Helek, <S%H2507><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asriel, <S%H844><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7928><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Shemida: <S%H8061><s%> these were the male <S%H2145><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

But Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> had no sons, <S%H1121><s%> but daughters: <S%H1323><s%> and these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his daughters: <S%H1323><s%> Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> Noah, <S%H5270><s%> Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> and Tirzah. <S%H8656><s%>

They came near <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> the princes, <S%H5387><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> us an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> our brothers. <S%H251><s%>" Therefore according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> them an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the brothers <S%H251><s%> of their father. <S%H1><s%>

Ten <S%H6235><s%> parts <S%H2256><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> to Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> besides the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> which is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan; <S%H3383><s%>

because the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> had <S%H5157><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his sons. <S%H1121><s%> The land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> belonged to the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was from Asher <S%H836><s%> to Michmethath, <S%H4366><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> Shechem. <S%H7927><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> went along <S%H1980><s%> to the right hand, <S%H3225><s%> to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of En Tappuah. <S%H5887><s%>

The land <S%H776><s%> of Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> belonged to Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> but Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> on the border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> belonged to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Kanah, <S%H7071><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> of the brook. <S%H5158><s%> These cities <S%H5892><s%> belonged to Ephraim <S%H669><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was on the north side <S%H6828><s%> of the brook, <S%H5158><s%> and ended <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Southward <S%H5045><s%> it was Ephraim <S%H669><s%>'s, and northward <S%H6828><s%> it was Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>'s, and the sea <S%H3220><s%> was his border. <S%H1366><s%> They reached <S%H6293><s%> to Asher <S%H836><s%> on the north, <S%H6828><s%> and to Issachar <S%H3485><s%> on the east. <S%H4217><s%>

Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> had three <S%H7969><s%> heights <S%H5316><s%> in Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> in Asher <S%H836><s%> Beth Shean <S%H1052><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Endor <S%H5874><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and its towns. <S%H1323><s%>

Yet the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> couldn't <S%H3201><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants of those cities; <S%H5892><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in that land. <S%H776><s%>

It happened, <S%H1121><s%> when the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had grown strong, <S%H2388><s%> that they put <S%H5414><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> to forced labor, <S%H4522><s%> and didn't <S%H3423><s%> utterly drive them out. <S%H3423><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Why have you given <S%H5414><s%> me just one <S%H259><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> part <S%H2256><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> since I am a great <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H5704><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> me so far? <S%H3541><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7227><s%> "If you are a great people, <S%H5971><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> to the forest, <S%H3293><s%> and clear <S%H1254><s%> land for yourself there in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> and of the Rephaim; <S%H7497><s%> since the hill country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is too narrow for you. <S%H213><s%>"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "The hill <S%H2022><s%> country is not enough <S%H4672><s%> for us. <S%H3669><s%> All the Canaanites who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%> have chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> both those who are in Beth Shean <S%H1052><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and those who are in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> even to Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and to Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You are a great <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and have great <S%H7227><s%> power. <S%H3581><s%> You shall not have one <S%H259><s%> lot only; <S%H1486><s%>

but the hill <S%H2022><s%> country shall be yours. <S%H3293><s%> Although it is a forest, you shall cut it down, <S%H1254><s%> and it <S%H8444><s%>'s farthest extent shall be yours; <S%H3423><s%> for you shall drive out the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> though they have chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> and though they are strong. <S%H2389><s%>"
